RegularExpression Id.
LatexMacro - Class in mlp
This class models LaTeX macros, that is, new user-defined LateX commands that are specified using one of the following LaTeX commands: \newcommand, \renewcommand, and \providecommand.
LatexMacro(String, String) - Constructor for class mlp.LatexMacro
Constructor; the constructed macro takes no arguments.
LatexMacro(String, int, String) - Constructor for class mlp.LatexMacro
Constructor.
LatexMacro(String, int, String, String) - Constructor for class mlp.LatexMacro
Constructor.
LatexUnicode - Class in mlp
A utility class for reading a file that has Unicodes and corresponding Latex commands/macros along with a brief description for each code, in a "raw" form, and returning a clean version of that.
LatexUnicode() - Constructor for class mlp.LatexUnicode

LexicalError(boolean, int, int, int, String, char) - Static method in error mlp.TokenMgrError
Returns a detailed message for the Error when it is thrown by the token manager to indicate a lexical error.
Lexicon - Class in mlp
Models a lexicon, where each entry is a (key,value) pair.
Lexicon() - Constructor for class mlp.Lexicon
Constructs an unnamed Lexicon object
Lexicon(String) - Constructor for class mlp.Lexicon
Constructs a named Lexicon object
Lexicon(String, Map<String, List<FeatureSet>>) - Constructor for class mlp.Lexicon
Constructs a named Lexicon object, populated by the specified map of (lexical key, feature-sets) pairs.
Lexicon(Map<String, List<FeatureSet>>) - Constructor for class mlp.Lexicon
Constructs an unnamed Lexicon object, populated by the specified map of (lexical key, feature-sets) pairs.
LexiconFactory - Class in mlp
A factory class with static methods to create Lexicon objects from input files, write Lexicons into files, merge Lexicons, change the names of features and the names of feature-sets, and provides some other Lexicon related methods.
LexiconFactory() - Constructor for class mlp.LexiconFactory
 
LexiconUtility - Class in mlp
A utility class that has static methods for manipulating lexicons.
LexiconUtility() - Constructor for class mlp.LexiconUtility
